paper_title.ja: ネパール存末羊種の生化学的多型
paper_title.en: Biochemical Polymorphisms of Nepalese Native Sheep Breeds

description.ja: ネパール在来の4羊種(Bhyanglung, Baruwal, Kagi, Lampuchhre)の遺伝的差異を検討するため電気泳動および測光法により20種の血液蛋白•非蛋白遺伝子座の遺伝子頻度を調査した.さらにBangladesh種との比較も併せて行なった.ネパール革種内において遺伝子頻度の明らかな差異が次の11座位で認められた.すなわち,Tf, Ary-Es, Lap, Hb-β, X-p, Dia-I, ME, Cat, CPI, LyおよびKeである.Baruwal種はTf<sup>E</sup>, HbβxおよびME<sup>S</sup>の遺伝子頻度が最も高かったのBhyanglung, KagiおよびLampuchhre種ではHbβA. HbβeおよびKe<sup>L</sup>遺伝子がそれぞれ最も高い頻度であった.Bangladesh種で検出されたAl<sup>A</sup>遺伝子はネパール全羊種ではみられず,ネパール羊種におけるHbβXとGPI<sup>2</sup>遺伝子はBangladesh種では検出されなかった.これらの羊種における多型遺伝子座の割合および平均ヘテロ接合体率の値から遺伝的変異性を評価すると,Baruwal種が最も低かった.NEIや数量分類学的な遺伝的距離ではKagi種とBangladesh種の間に近縁関係がみられた.しかもそれらはLampuchhre種と系統的に近い関係にあったが,Bhyanglung種やBaruwal種とはかけ離れていた.
description.en: Allele frequencies for 20 blood protein and non-protein loci in four Nepalese native sheep breeds (Bhyanglung, Baruwal, Kagi and Lampuchhre) were determined electrophoretically and photometrically for examining their genetic differences. These breeds were compared with a Bangladeshi native sheep breed (Bangladesh). Distinct differences in allele frequencies within Nepalese native breeds were seen at 11 loci: Tf, Ary-Es, Lap, Hb-β, X-p, Dia-I, ME, Cat, GPI, Ly and Ke. Baruwal had the highest frequencies of Tf<sup>E</sup>, Hbβ<sup>X</sup> and ME<sup>S</sup> alleles. In Bhyanglung, Kagi and Lampuchhre, HbβA, HbβB and Ke<sup>L</sup> alleles, respectively, were noted most frequently, The Al<sup>A</sup> allele observed in Bangladesh was not detected in any Nepalese sheep breeds, and Hbβ<sup>X</sup> and GPI<sup>2</sup> alleles in all Nepalese sheep breeds were not detected in Bangladesh. Ingenetic variability assessed based on the proportion of polymorphic loci and average heterozygosity, Baruwal was the lowest in these breeds. In NEI's and taxonomic distances, aclose relationship between Kagi and Bangladesh was seen. They differed from Bhyanglung and Baruwal but not from Lampuchhre phylogenetically.

paper_title.en: Biochemical Polymorphisms of Nenalese Native Sheep Breeds

description.en: Allele frequencies for 20 blood protein and non-protein loci in four Nepalese native sheep breeds (Bhyanglung, Baruwal, Kagi and Lampuchhre) were determined electrophoretically and photometrically for examining their genetic differences. Baruwal had the highest frequencies of Tf<sup>E</sup>, Hbβ<sup>X</sup> and ME<sup>S</sup> alleles. In Bhyanglung, Kagi and Lampuchhre, HbβA, HbβB and Ke<sup>L</sup> alleles, respectively, were noted most frequently, The Al<sup>A</sup> allele observed in Bangladesh was not detected in any Nepalese sheep breeds, and Hbβ<sup>X</sup> and GPI<sup>2</sup> alleles in all Nepalese sheep breeds were not detected in Bangladesh. Ingenetic variability assessed based on the proportion of polymorphic loci and average heterozygosity, Baruwal was the lowest in these breeds. In NEI's and taxonomic distances, aclose relationship between Kagi and Bangladesh was seen. They differed from Bhyanglung and Baruwal but not from Lampuchhre phylogenetically.
